DOC.brief_summary: This international , multicenter , prospective , non control , non randomize , clinical study collect electrical impedance data potentially malignant pigment nevi histological diagnosis ( International Melanoma Algorithm Training Study [ IMATS ] ) . The study objective collect data train optimization algorithm classify skin lesion use electrical impedance , i.e. , identify malignant melanoma .
DOC.brief_title: International Melanoma Algorithm Training Study - IMATS
